thread.title: Coroner Report Reveals Kurt Cobain Was Using $400 Worth Of Heroin Every Day Shortly Before Death [News]
thread.title_full: Coroner Report Reveals Kurt Cobain Was Using $400 Worth Of Heroin Every Day Shortly Before Death [News]

title: Coroner Report Reveals Kurt Cobain Was Using $400 Worth Of Heroin Every Day Shortly Before Death [News]
text:
Coroner Report Reveals Kurt Cobain Was Using $400 Worth of Heroin Every Day Shortly Before Death $700 per day in today's money. UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 9 hours ago 4 
In the new Reelz series "Autopsy: The Last Hours of Kurt Cobain," expert coroner and forensic pathologist Dr. Michael Hunter revealed late Nirvana frontman had a lethal dose of heroin in his body shortly before committing suicide. 
The expert said (via Radar Online ): "His heroin use increased. He was using about $400 worth of heroin every day. And that's $700 in today's prices." 
Hunter added: "This is an enormous amount of heroin to take on a daily basis. Those that were close to him realized that if they didn't do something, Kurt was going to die."
